snippet: France's largest bank reported nearly a 10 percent rise in its net income to $3.8 billion in the first three months of the year, helped by the sale of a real estate business.
abstract: France's largest bank reported nearly a 10 percent rise in its net income to $3.8 billion in the first three months of the year, helped by the sale of a real estate business.

headline.main: BNP Paribas Profit Rises 10% in First Quarter
headline.print_headline: Finance: Profit At BNP Paribas Is Lifted By An Asset Sale
